channel.title: Projects on Griffin Steffy
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Griffin Steffy

item.title: Chicken Coop
item.description: They always said that chickens were the gateway animal into everything else. Where that might be true, it still sounded like a fun thing for our family to enjoy and learn from.

item.title: Homelab
